description.value:
The amulet of false life also conceals that you remain alive.

Level: 6
Category: Deception
Time: 10 minutes
Duration: 24 hours
Component Cost: Focus (amulet of false life)
Market Price: 360 gp
Key Skill: Arcana (no check)

The creature wearing the amulet appears to be dead to all senses for the duration of the ritual's effect. This effect ends when the affected creature chooses to take an action or if the affected creature is no longer wearing the amulet.

Published in Dragon Magazine 385, page(s) 28.
